Pre-Game Insights: Suryakumar Yadav is the new captain of the Indian team in T20Is
Gautham Gambhir is the new Head Coach of the Indian team in T20Is
Rohit Sharma, Virat Kohli and Ravindra Jadeja have bid adieu to T20Is
Miscellaneous Highlights: Dilshan Madushanka is expected to replace Nuwan Thushara in the Sri Lankan squad due to an injury
Others: The series will take place from July 27 to July 30 at the Pallekele International Cricket Stadium, Pallekele
The Indian team is looking to chart their roadmap for the T20 World Cup 2026 to be held on home soil
